elements.label: A Master Clockmaker
elements.description: Description of an aloof father who spends more time in his workshop than with his family.

elements.label: An Angry Clockmaker
elements.description: Your father has locked himself away in his study and refuses to speak with you.

elements.label: A Broken Clockmaker
elements.description: His internal mechanics have broken and no longer keep time. Some days he runs forward, too fast, and some days he runs back. He is right less than twice a day. His health slowly fades.
